column4: Hello, when i tried to compile c program in Debian linux, i get this error : undefined reference to `errno', can anybody help me
Actually, i try to reinstall libc6, before i do that, i can compile it sucessfully
if you find that  'grep -rs ?extern int errno? *' gives an answer from the stuff you put on your machine or in the source it needs conventions to be updated

no, because that platform is full of lockin and the spec is not open, I do believe that some people are working on a solution, but then the length of a piece of string is similar to the depth of a hole :-)
